DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Metabolism Excretion 14C-TRV130 Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This study open-label , non-randomized , metabolism excretion study single 2 mg IV dose [ 14C ] TRV130 ( approximately 100 µCi ) administer 10 mL manual IV push 2 minute fast state .
